title: Britney Spears Niece Rushed To Hospital | Big D | 95.5 The Bull
text:
Britney Spears Niece Rushed To Hospital posted by Big D - share 
Jamie Lynn Spears' 8-year-old daughter, Maddie, was badly hurt in an ATV accident Sunday, and we're told her condition is extremely serious. 
Several sources in Kentwood, Louisiana tell TMZ, Maddie was on a Polaris off-road vehicle when it flipped over. We're told she was under water for several minutes and unconscious. 
She was airlifted to a nearby hospital. 
Jamie Lynn was not with her daughter when the accident occurred. Maddie was involved in a hunting expedition at the time of the accident. Contact
